clock

Class CurrentClockText

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.scene.Node
      • javafx.scene.shape.Shape

          • clock.CurrentClockText
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    public class CurrentClockText
extends javafx.scene.text.Text
    A Subclass of Text that displays the current system time.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Selim Dincer

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int HOUR
      Show the current hour only for example: 18.
      static int HOUR_MINUTE
      Show the current hour and minute for example: 18:47.
      static int HOUR_MINUTE_SECOND
      Show the current hour, minute and second for example: 18:47:16.
      static int HOUR_MINUTE_SECOND_MILLISECOND
      Show the current hour, minute, second and millisecond for example: 18:47:16.234.

        BASELINE_OFFSET_SAME_AS_HEIGHT
